reviewText: I bought this movie only for Laureano Olivares. It's completely in Spanish with NO English subtitles. It's the story of a guy who rises to power & how he deals with the violence & protection of his family. The ending is sad, as is all his movies & I don't understand why that is. It's your basic naro-novela but in movie format as far as I'm concerned but 5 stars because the movie is almost all Laureano.
